LONG.NAME: Household race is non-white or ethnicity is of Spanish descent
Respondent or household member age is above 65
Highest level of education completed by respondent high school or less
Poverty based on U.S. Census Bureau threshold

Household fully pays natural gas bills
Household reported difficulty paying energy bills; repairing or replacing broken heating or cooling equipment; or that they had kept their home at unsafe
